title: Why short run ATC is U-shaped

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why the short-run average total cost curve is U-shaped?

choices.label: Spreading total fixed costs over a larger output, and constant returns
Spreading total fixed costs over a larger output, and eventually diminishing returns
Increasing total fixed costs and increasing returns
Increasing average variable costs and decreasing returns
Decreasing average variable costs and increasing returns

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
